# Course Website

Source code for a course website. The slides are written in [Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/) and converted into a functional website using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and [reveal.js](https://revealjs.com/).


## Course Objectives

1. Understand and apply fundamental programming concepts.
1. Develop problem-solving and algorithmic thinking skills.
1. Gain proficiency in multiple programming languages and tools.
